TopicTitle: Some bought parts don't remain bought!

Articles.Content:
Weird bug, when I buy some parts in the tech tree and exit de R&D, they can't be used! I tried to do that from R&D and in the VAB, with same results. It's only some of the parts, which is super strange.

 

Did this happened to anyone else??
What parts does this happen to? And what mod are they from? Can we get a complete list of mods you have installed?
